Articles.Content:
Thanks. Removing ATM made my game playable again, and it's running smooth now. I have 16GB of RAM, so I guess I don't really need ATM anyway.

ATM is already fixed.

ATM is already fixed.

Word. Reinstalled the new version. No problems. Thanks.

Thanks. Removing ATM made my game playable again, and it's running smooth now. I have 16GB of RAM, so I guess I don't really need ATM anyway.

You're limited by engine's 4 GB anyway, so...

ATM is already fixed.

Seems like it also "fixed" visor reflections. I don't see them, even though they're enabled in config.

P.S. Even stranger than that, I don't seem to have reflections anymore even after I disabled ATM O_o

Edited October 14, 2014 by Mystique

Upload your log.

Oops, sorry.

I found this :

[TR.TextureReplacer] UnityEngine.UnityException: Texture 'TextureReplacer/EnvMap/PositiveX' is not readable, the texture memory can not be accessed from scripts. You can make the texture readable in the Texture Import Settings.

at (wrapper managed-to-native) UnityEngine.Texture2D:GetPixels (int,int,int,int,int)

at UnityEngine.Texture2D.GetPixels (Int32 miplevel) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at UnityEngine.Texture2D.GetPixels () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at TextureReplacer.Reflections.initialise () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at TextureReplacer.TextureReplacer.LateUpdate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

Upload your log.

Well, huh, i simply removed the incriminated texture, and everything works now. But i don't know why it did that...

Anyway, thanks.

I'm running into a memory leak when using this mod. Without it my KSP sits at about 2.8 to 3 GB but with this mod my memory usage will slowly climb until KSP runs out of memory. Is anyone else having this issue?

Oops, sorry.

I found this :

[TR.TextureReplacer] UnityEngine.UnityException: Texture 'TextureReplacer/EnvMap/PositiveX' is not readable, the texture memory can not be accessed from scripts. You can make the texture readable in the Texture Import Settings.

at (wrapper managed-to-native) UnityEngine.Texture2D:GetPixels (int,int,int,int,int)

at UnityEngine.Texture2D.GetPixels (Int32 miplevel) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at UnityEngine.Texture2D.GetPixels () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at TextureReplacer.Reflections.initialise () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

at TextureReplacer.TextureReplacer.LateUpdate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

Update ATM, 3-6 was buggy and caused this.

I downloaded a very nice HD skybox but in the game it looks really ugly, I think this mod change some things I guess, is there a way to fix this?

Thanks
Hmmm, KSP-AVC tells me there is a 1.8 version of this mod. But still 1.7.3 here and on the download page.

Hmmm, KSP-AVC tells me there is a 1.8 version of this mod. But still 1.7.3 here and on the download page.

There's 1.8 prerelease on GitHub. I'm not yet sure if I will officially release it.

UPDATE: I've split the prerelease version to a new branch. It shouldn't report a new version any more.

Edited October 14, 2014 by shaw

I downloaded a very nice HD skybox but in the game it looks really ugly, I think this mod change some things I guess, is there a way to fix this?

Thanks

Disabling texture compression in `@Default.cfg` might help.

I'm running into a memory leak when using this mod. Without it my KSP sits at about 2.8 to 3 GB but with this mod my memory usage will slowly climb until KSP runs out of memory. Is anyone else having this issue?

Does this happen during loading or gameplay? Use of TR can increase memory usage if you have some big replacement textures. Especially planet textures are usually pretty huge.
What could be the cause of visor reflections not working? I really miss those

What could be the cause of visor reflections not working? I really miss those

Maybe ATM 3-6. Upload your log.

Does this happen during loading or gameplay? Use of TR can increase memory usage if you have some big replacement textures. Especially planet textures are usually pretty huge.

During Gameplay. During loading it tops out at about 2.5-2.8 GB
can someone please help. i'm trying to get this mod going, and i'm probably being really stupid, but i can't seem to figure it out :'(

can someone please help. i'm trying to get this mod going, and i'm probably being really stupid, but i can't seem to figure it out :'(

Not sure what you mean. Drop it into your gamedata and you should be set, unless you want cool textures or more kerbal heads, then you need a pack featured on the first page.

Not sure what you mean. Drop it into your gamedata and you should be set, unless you want cool textures or more kerbal heads, then you need a pack featured on the first page.

sorry. trying to get my custom Universe Replacer textures working, but they won't.

sorry. trying to get my custom Universe Replacer textures working, but they won't.

Universe replacer uses a different folder setup than Texture Replacer, Read the first page some more and see if that gives you any insight as to how to make the conversion.

Maybe ATM 3-6. Upload your log.
